Asgarnian hops are grown from Asgarnian seeds at level 8 Farming. Four hops are used to brew Asgarnian ale at level 24 Cooking.

Asgarnian seeds may be bought or stolen from Olivia in Draynor, stolen from Master farmers, received as a monster drop, or purchased from other players. The hops themselves can only be acquired through farming or from other players.

Farmers can be paid one sack of onions to watch over the hops patch for the player.

According to the book Gielinor's flora - hops, Asgarnian hops were first bred as a hobby by a Guthixian druid of Taverley.

[[File:Asgarnian hops detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Asgarnian hops''' are grown from [[Asgarnian seed]]s at level 8 [[Farming]]. Four hops are used to [[Brewing|brew]] [[Asgarnian ale]] at level 24 [[Cooking]].

Asgarnian seeds may be bought or stolen from [[Olivia]] in [[Draynor]], stolen from [[Master farmer]]s, received as a monster drop, or purchased from other players. The hops themselves can only be acquired through farming or from other players.

Farmers can be paid one sack of [[onions]] to watch over the [[hops patch]] for the player.

According to the book [[Gielinor's flora - hops]], Asgarnian hops were first bred as a hobby by a Guthixian druid of [[Taverley]].
